entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 12:05 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 96 %

Wind: S 12 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
